ResearchProjectDef.label: protien rendering
ResearchProjectDef.description: A bioship is not a natural organism that contains the pattern of its ultimate developement. Its growth must be guided and shaped, and it is by this clay that it shall know its ultimate form.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText: Creating a bioship is a bit different than constructing a conventional ship. The first step is to build the outline of the ship out of protien scaffolds. Once the scaffolds of the ship have been built, including the floor scaffolds, build the Shipheart on the floor scaffolds. The heart will expand outward, converting surrounding scaffolds into flesh.\nThis process is nutrient intensive, so be prepared to feed your ship with meat as it grows.

ResearchProjectDef.label: structural scaffolds
ResearchProjectDef.description: First we shall lay the ribs and bones, that the fledgling should know its outline.\nClinician Notes: Simple configurations of the clay result in the formation of bone, muscle, and structural tissues.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nerve staples
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unchecked growth could lead to undesired outcomes. By these means we shall numb the beast's senses and shape it to our design.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mutation inducers
ResearchProjectDef.description: The explosive cell growth experienced when the seed expands into being a proper ship heart results in a raft of mutations. It should be possible to induce this process to our own ends..

ResearchProjectDef.label: gene expression influcers
ResearchProjectDef.description: While the outcome of the creature's mutations will always be up to chance, with these tools we can put our fingers on the scales of probability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: simple metabolc scaffolds
ResearchProjectDef.description: Hunger shall guide the first growth, but direction and discretion will be required beyond that point. It would not do to clog your halls and aterties with glistening fat and glutonous maws, now would it little one?

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced metabolic scaffolds
ResearchProjectDef.description: You have tasted the simple joys of sweet flesh little one, but there are more rarified palates to consider.

ResearchProjectDef.label: thermoregulatory scaffolds
ResearchProjectDef.description: Battle has you beset by fever and boiling blood little one, let me show you how to cool yourself.

ResearchProjectDef.label: small weapon scaffolds
ResearchProjectDef.description: Here now little one, accept our gift: Flicking darts to deter the unwary predator and subdue your prey.

ResearchProjectDef.label: medium weapon scaffolds
ResearchProjectDef.description: Chemistry to corrode and to ignite little one, to pit and shatter the hides of your prey.

ResearchProjectDef.label: large weapon scaffolds
ResearchProjectDef.description: Barbs to fling at the far ranging foe that thinks you helpless at a distance. Punish them for their temerity little one.

ResearchProjectDef.label: spinal weapon scaffolds
ResearchProjectDef.description: What shape your mightiest weapon will take I can only guess little one.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ganglic cluster scaffold
ResearchProjectDef.description: Quicken your thoughts little one, and with that speed free yourself from gravity's smothering embrace.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced ganglic cluster scaffold
ResearchProjectDef.description: Let your will be as steel little one, their blandishments shall break upon it before ever touching your flesh.
